Description.Name: Habitats Galore Argo Pod Upgrade
Description.Details: This appointment will send one of our trusted Habitats Galore, a Boeing Interstellar Subsidiary, sales representatives who will happily come to you and discuss the various options for upgrading your dropship to include cozy living quarters for your future addtional crew. All we ask for is a small deposit to cover our travel costs to you in orbit. This item is for Argo upgrade only, it will not install in mechs
